body: The first few weeks the app was very informative but as you move on throughout your pregnancy you get more ads and surveys rather than info. A lot of the videos are outdated with some old fashion information. I noticed a lot of the text focuses on negative information and ‚Äúwhat can go wrong‚Äù installing fear.. not really my style. It was also very irritating that although you have the option to chose boy or girl the text doesn‚Äôt change. A lot of the text says ‚Äúshe‚Äù and well... I‚Äôm having a boy. The plus side is it has tools you can use, kick counts, weekly bumpie photos, and a birth plan (although when you download the PDF it cuts off a large portion so it‚Äôs not that helpful).

title: Exactly What You Need..
body: I would have given this 5 stars, because it‚Äôs a truly great pregnancy app, except I am super irritated by the fact that it logs you out of your account several times a day and makes you log back in. I don‚Äôt understand the trouble in keeping you signed in (my phone has the latest software update and the app is updated, too).

title: Love this App!
body: This App got me through my pregnancy and also after my baby was born. I love the articles and reminders and taking pictures of my bump and baby. I highly recommend this to every mom and mom-to-be. It‚Äôs very easy to use and has tons of good information. The only complaint I have is when I take or upload pictures and it doesn‚Äôt come up right and there‚Äôs a black space on the side. It doesn‚Äôt automatically center and I don‚Äôt know how to get it to not do that. It‚Äôs awesome otherwise.

title: Love this app!!!!
body: I have been a long time fan of this app and baby center in general. I first found it back in 2009 when I was pregnant with my first daughter, and still continue to use it today with my second. I love the fact that it gives you not only week by week updates but there are also day by day articles and developmental information. They even send you emails related to your older children up until age 10. Amazing app and I would absolutely recommend it to any parent.

title: New mom
body: I check the app literally everyday. Just to read the group posts and questions. It's not only for the women carrying but for the men as well. My boyfriend was curious of the size and things developing so he downloaded the app as well and absolutely loves it. I highly recommend using it if it's your first time becoming a mom. A lot of the other women have the same questions I was wondering and put me at ease. It's a huge community full of understanding and loving mothers. I don't regret it at all. I recommend it to any upcoming parents.

title: Rate of BabyCenter App 9/9/20
body: They are very reminding/notifying and also educational.. well I know,,, I learned at least one thing I didn‚Äôt know on a daily  (and have even experienced) some of the things I would read about  ... title: Baby Center Great for Multiples?
body: I absolutely love this app. It‚Äôs so easy to use and has a lot of information. I especially appreciate how it helps guide the parents through what to expect and what steps to do. I have used it with my previous two pregnancies.

title: Very detailed
body: Everything is very detailed in this app so it‚Äôs way too helpful for new parents  who are just stepping into parenthood as well as the ones who already have experienced of having one baby long ago n now they have to start again like me I have one daughter who s 8 year old n the other one is 6 months old so I almost forgot everything but with this app I m again coming back on track .. one more thing is that you can learn from other parents experiences too

title: Great Baby Guide
body: This is an amazing app. As a first time mom who basically had to do everything on my own, this app has helped guide me through my pregnancy and first year of motherhood. On top of that there are so many sources of information available and forums for moms and moms-to-be to engage in and form support groups. It has answered a lot of my questions and helped me keep track of the different stages of pregnancy as well as baby milestones and what to look out or forward to. Highly recommended for both moms, dads and expectancts.

title: Answers my questions before I ask
body: I was sitting in the dentists office today and I started thinking about when I might need to start taking my 7 month old to the dentist. Sure enough, within hours I get my weekly email and one of the topics is dental care for your babe. This happens all the time! If someone else asks about the development of their own child, I just have to search a topic and I land on exactly the info I need. Very comprehensive articles about everything I think about. Can't be beat!!

title: 2nd timing to use the site.
body: I loved having the baby tracker and using this site during my pregnancy and still up to now. I have a 8year old and a almost 1 year old and I absolutely love the information it has gave me and helped me at times of stuff I kinda forgot as time has passed or needed to check on to refresh my memory. I strongly advise any parent or new parents to use!

title: What was the purpose of the update?
body: Although this app was good to use when I was pregnant, I unfortunately ended up having a miscarriage. Shortly after, this app had an update that was supposed to allow you to have access to the app if you were trying to conceive. I immediately went ahead with the update because my fianc√© and I were still hopeful to try again for a baby. Lo and behold, despite the update, you are unable to use this app if you‚Äôre not actually pregnant. Therefore, I‚Äôm forced to wait to use this app until I become pregnant again. At this point, I‚Äôm still unsure as to what the ‚Äúupdate‚Äù was even for.

title: I love it
body: I been having this app since I was 20 years old. It help me on a lot of things and my concern of being a new mom is awesome I really recommend this app for first time Mom‚Äôs especially if you have no idea and or you don‚Äôt have the support system of helping you what to do with a baby this is the app. I totally recommend this for everybody and also the ones that‚Äôs actually trying to have a baby it will give you great information if there way a I could rate this a 10 i definitely will

title: This App Does it ALL!!!
body: This app is amazing. Not only does it provide important information and  articles, but they break it down step by step with pictures to accompany the text. In addition, it has registry information, baby name suggestions and a variety of supportive community group chats that covers any woman at any stage during her pregnancy journey. Whether you‚Äôre trying to conceive, had a miscarriage, have questions about ovulation, your body, products related to pregnancy, currently pregnant or had a baby, this IS THE APP FOR YOU!!!

title: First time mom-approved and recommended app
body: I am learning day by day about my babies‚Äô growth and development. All of the articles I have read  and the video clips I have watched (on repeat!) are very helpful to me as a soon-to-be first time mom of multiples. I especially love the food, medication and symptom lookup. It makes pregnancy less scary when you are knowledgeable of the do‚Äôs and don‚Äôts. And it makes preparing for your baby/babies easier with all the tips and hacks from other moms and/or parents. I highly recommend this app.

title: Love it!
body: This app is so easy to use and allows you to look ahead to prepare for what‚Äôs coming or look back if you found out a little late in the game that you were pregnant. I also enjoy that you can change your due date if needed and you can see how far along you are to the date. I think this app is awesome for dads to be as well because it has so much information for them to understand the process so that they don‚Äôt feel ‚Äúleft out‚Äù. They like to be included as well.

title: Helped make the journey enjoyable
body: At 31 weeks pregnant I have had times that I worried throughout my journey, such as when I didn‚Äôt feel baby move a whole lot, or having random nauseous days, but this app always seemed to have articles or a person that had a similar experience. Which brought me tons of relief.

title: Love this app // Trigger Warning
body: I used this app through 5 out of 6 of my pregnancies. It was very easy to end the weekly notifications when I miscarried, which was different from the first app I used where I couldn‚Äôt make the notifications stop. I love the updates, all the content, and the wide variety of supportive features. I have two boys, my youngest is 7 months and 2 weeks and I‚Äôm LOVING the weekly updates. They provide insight into my baby‚Äôs behaviors and tips to help make life easier. Thanks BabyCenter!!

title: My favorite app
body: I‚Äôve used this app since I was two months pregnant and I absolutely love it! I thought it was just a pregnancy tracking app, but after the birth of your child, it shows you milestones for him/her, and it also gives you a LOT of great information about different things your child might be going through every week! I use it at least once a week, and I‚Äôm pretty sure it has helped shaped my mothering skills. It gives you recommendations on literally everything!

title: The Best Baby App!!!
body: I am a first time mother and I used this app on a daily basis when I was pregnant. It really does have all the information that you need to know. I rarely have to google anything because this app has all the answers. I also love the fact that it is still very useful even after the baby is born. My son is now 7 months and I still get updates and information for babies at this stage. I rarely write reviews but this app has been so useful to me that I felt compelled to share.

title: My best friend and every hour
body: Through sleepless nights, endless questions and New dad panic, this app and website have been INVALUABLE.  Years of overthinking could never compare to the wealth of information, ease of access and variety of insight provided. I could say more, but my baby doesn‚Äôt sleep through the night yet and so that means I don‚Äôt either. Wow, thank you BabyCenter. You‚Äôve been a true friend for the past 15 months and I will always sing your praises.

title: Appreciative for this app
body: Going through my pregnancy i May have been a bit dramatic and there were a lot of questions i had about several different things. The groups were supportive and it was very good to know that other women had some of the same issues i had. Most of the time i was emotionally out of it i would turn to this app for support. Outside of support groups i love the fact that i would be updated on the progress that my baby would be making born and unborn.

title: Continues to send notifications after miscarriage!!
body: I don‚Äôt typically rate apps, but I had to this time. We downloaded the app after learning we were pregnant. We loved Baby Center for our previous pregnancies. However, we suffered a miscarriage several weeks ago. I updated my information on the app and in my Baby Center profile. However, the app continues to notify me each week of my baby‚Äôs progress. I can‚Äôt get it to stop. When I open the app to try any remove the pregnancy, it says I don‚Äôt have a currently pregnancy listed.

title: As a new mum! Love it!
body: Great app! Love the weekly notification of baby growth while in my tummy also like how I was able to take photos and add caption/signs to the photo. I also enjoy the weekly to monthly growth milestone notifications. I love the search function if I have a question it lets me know that they is other parents that are going through the same thing and provide the feedback of the situation. Another thing that I like was that there isn‚Äôt many adds bombarding my time w the app. I am a super satisfied.

title: Awesome for week by week
body: This app is absolutely awesome!! I have NO negative comments about it!! The entire time I was pregnant I had this app and it was sooo cute to be able to see each week how big she had gotten with the fruit comparisons! It was so comforting feeling having videos and hearing other moms suggestions and having so much to offer on this app! I love it, and the after pregnancy features with all the baby stuff is even better! I have no negative thoughts about this app, Babycenter does an amazing job ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: BabyCenter has the answers!!!
body: First of all I love how the app sends you notifications about when you enter each new week of pregnancy! It‚Äôs always fun to find out what food my baby sizes up to each week. One thing I really love is that every time I have a weird question or need to learn about something, there‚Äôs an article on BabyCenter or someone else asking the same question. So I don‚Äôt have to feel confused or alone! I‚Äôve learned so much that I can feel more educated about my pregnancy and my baby.

title: Love !!!
body: It great it make me feel like there always somebody to help me , this is my first time haveing a baby and It feel good that it taking me threw the process of what is normal or any pain . And I absolutely love the videos it make me have a way clear understanding and I‚Äôm also glad they have pictures of how small or how big your baby is looking now inside of you . Oh and it keeps track on how many weeks my baby and the day I should give birth so that really good but I love this app and keep up the great work !!!!!

title: Great for Grandmas and Dads
body: Baby Center is something I didn‚Äôt have as a mother-to-be 35 years ago.  As a now grandmother-to-be (after 15 years since my granddaughter), I feel bonded to my new one to come.  The images and videos help me a lot!  I read and look at every update emailed me to learn what the baby is doing from week to week.  It‚Äôs amazing and exciting.  My son-in-law can follow his baby along too.  How can you not fall in love with your tiny being knowing his/her life inside the womb? Glad to discover Baby Center (thanks!).

title: I absolutely love this app
body: I love this app so much. It makes me feel connected to my baby by learning about the changes she goes through in the womb. The app is so spot on when it comes to symptoms us mommies should be feeling during a certain time in the pregnancy. I check every single week at the growth of my baby, the changes that happen to both me and baby. And also read the articles provided. Because they are so informational. I love this app. I would recommend it to any mama ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Lifesaver for Me
body: This is a lifesaver for me as a new mom. I love the updates & how easy it is to find info. I got other apps as a new Mom but this is the only 1 that I‚Äôve continued to use. I‚Äôve never been 1 to join chat boards or groups but I absolutely LOVE that I joined the BabyCenter group. As a new Mom it feels so good to know you‚Äôre not the only 1 experiencing whatever you‚Äôre going through at that moment. I‚Äôm ALWAYS able to find info on any question I have & am always able to find realistic solutions quickly.

title: HappyMommy
body: I love using the app because it gives me all the information I have not been able to receive from most people around. Where some information lacks in detail through open resources and close relations, baby center has provided close to details, reliable resources, and enlightening videos that help the idea of pregnancy seem like a breeze! I enjoy the baby tracker and am astonished by the tools it provides. Thank you to those who‚Äôve created such an amazing idea to life!

title: It‚Äôs good for current and expecting mothers
body: The app gives great advice and updates for when you are pregnant. I used it mostly when I was pregnant. It explains what‚Äôs happening weekly with your baby in womb. It also gives updates after baby is born that I read also. I get advice for my 9 year old on the app well. The app has a contraction timer, you can edit and save pregnancy pics, discussion pages with other moms for questions, opinions and advice and they have much more ü•∞ I love this app.

title: Forever grateful!
body: Beneficial app! I am a first-time mother, so everything was so new to me. My mom did her best to give me tips here and there, but sometimes people forget the process when it was such a long time ago for them. I also was adopted, so some of the bodily functions and emotions associated with the body changing my mom never went through before. This app is like having a mother, a close sister, a grandmother, all in one. It held my hand through everything and still is!!:-) I am so grateful for this app!

title: Totally recommend this app!
body: Way better than any other baby app and is very very accurate. Shows you day to day of how you and your baby are growing. Also if you have questions you can type it in the search bar and get all kinds of answers. There is also a kick counter and all kinds of tools for before and after baby. There is even videos every other day of how you and baby are growing, or you can watch birthing videos and etc. I really love this app!

title: App works well and provide advised tips
body: Good app overall. Useful content it seems (been using it for a month). Areas to improve:

title: Great for New Parents
body: As a new parent and new to the fatherhood. I didn‚Äôt really know what to expect when having a baby. But this app did a great job, when it comes to preparing and taking good measures for the welcoming of the baby. And also things to do for my wife to make her feel comfortable during her pregnancy.

title: First Time Mom
body: I love this app. I‚Äôm a first time mom and I was so confused. My friend Lex referred the app to me since she used it with her two kids and raved about how great it is. Thankfully I have had a wonderful experience and have been learning things I never knew before. It‚Äôs helpful to have the kicker app for getting closer to the due date and the bumpies help me feel and see the difference in my body over the months I‚Äôve been pregnant.

title: Love this app!
body: I was a little skeptical about getting this app but I love it. As the weeks go on, I send me information to the hubby and he feels so included. We both get so excited when we realize that our baby is making progression. I think my favorite thing about this app is comparing the size of the baby to fruit. It‚Äôs so exciting! Oh and another thing is that the articles they include make you feel like you aren‚Äôt alone in this. All in all, it‚Äôs a wonderful app. 5 out of 5 stars!

title: Extremely informative
body: I love being able to read about how my baby is growing weekly, looking weekly, how he or she is forming, what helps with the symptoms I‚Äôm having  and everything else that it offers! I get so freaking excited every week to tell my other two boys when they ask, ‚ÄúHey Mom, which fruit or vegetable is the baby this week??‚Äù Im very grateful for this app & the creators of it. They are saving the wondering minds of mothers and keeping them content with knowledge they are gaining daily with this app. ‚ù§Ô∏èü•∞

title: I wish I could love it as much as I used to.
body: I love all of the info and articles relating to pregnancy, babies and children. The app itself is easy to use for the most part. For some reason the community pages don‚Äôt load all the way or the screen goes blank when I‚Äôm reading or responding to a post. I loved this app and the support from the community with my first pregnancy, which is why I returned when I got pregnant again. I‚Äôm already tired of dealing with the freezing and having to reset the app only to have the same things happen again within minutes.

title: Best Pregnancy And Now New Mom App

title: My favorite pregnancy app and beyond!!
body: I loved this app when I was pregnant and being able to read all the different details of what is going on and what to expect. A major plus is the blog area which connects u to tons of mommas who can give advise or just vent. Then, not realizing after I had my baby, it sends me an alert and now is following my child every week with updates and facts. It is simply the best. Don‚Äôt even bother buying the book what to expect when expecting. It is all here.

title: Helpful but glitchy
body: Overall I love the app and find the information provided to be very helpful. From the videos to informational links and more I have found this app to be quite useful. Being a first time mom I have taken heed of the text provided and often go back to look at those topics when providing information to others. However I do get frustrated when the app just logs me out on it‚Äôs on for some odd reason. It‚Äôs a hassle to have to re-enter all of my information every time. That alone makes you want to delete the app and not bother with it. Please fix this issue someone.

title: Best baby app ever
body: When my sister was pregnant I wanted to track her but I couldn‚Äôt find an app that can do it well but then when I was looking on my phone an ad popped up babycenter it did everything it tracks your baby it shows what sizes they are every week and it shows the baby in your stomach and which parts of there body are forming they also sell things there for your you and your baby like breast pumps so if your looking for an tracking baby app this is the one

title: perfect.
body: downloaded this app ever since i found out i was pregnant.. It‚Äôs so informative and helpful. I‚Äôve learned a lot since downloading the app (learned more from this than from my doc.üò¨) it‚Äôs simple and so easy to use, I love how it notifies me whenever i‚Äôm x amount of weeks. Thank you to the developers of this app. (i also never write reviews for anything...ever.) highly recommend.(-:

title: Love this app
body: I got the baby center app while I was pregnant to track the progress of my little nugget growing in my belly...

title: Great app
body: Used this app for both of my pregnancies. I love following it week by week and I love that you can track your belly as it gets bigger and add pics/filters . It was fun to switch back to my older son when I was pregnant with my second to see the differences too because everything saves for each child and you can just click back-and-forth. I also really enjoy the weekly milestone updates and that my three-year-old still gets them as well.

title: Baby Center
body: I adore this app and have used it with both pregnancies. It gives me tips and reminders as I fly through my pregnancy which I love. It also has different forums for all types of mothers across the world who you can share your experiences and vice verse with. Baby Center is a wonderful app especially for first time mothers. I would recommend to anyone. Lastly I do also love how even though my first child is going on 3 now, Baby Center doesn‚Äôt hesitate to still keep me up to date on his progressive steps as well and what I can look out for.

title: Sarah, USA; FL
body: I Love üòç this app makes connecting to the right things and geting the best all around information on your body and your baby up to date and based on science, üß™and facts.  You can even talk to real people online who can help with a situation you maybe dealing with but you can not get an answer to the question out of your doctor or provider at that time and it may just be the solution you need.  Thanks baby Center for making this all possible! I have been a member for over 9 yrs!

title: Loveee
body: I‚Äôve been using this app since I got pregnant with my first child in 2015 and I now use it again with my second. Not only does it inform you all throughout your pregnancy but it also gives you tips and advice on your growing child at each stage of life ! Highly recommend it to all mommy‚Äôs and daddy‚Äôs to be !

title: Great information
body: I really enjoy this site and the information is great. I work with toddlers and infants and the information here is spot on. This is my second pregnancy and both times I used the app. Love the videos on the fetus‚Äôs development and then the child‚Äôs development after birth. It would be great if there was an option to add another email ( like my husband‚Äôs) address of someone who wanted to receive the same alerts of how the fetus is developing without them having to sign up.

title: Amazing
body: This app is the absolute best. I have had since I found out I was pregnant until now and my baby girl is 6 weeks old. It helped so much as far as giving you information that you may need to helping you to stay informed on things that you may not have even thought about. It also gives you a forum to share your thoughts and concerns with others and get their feedback as well. This is the best app I have ever used and would recommend it to anyone!

title: So much better than What to Expect!
body: IM 21 weeks and have been using the What to Expect When You‚Äôre Expecting‚Äù app. What a waste of time. This app is so much better! The tracking tools for contractions and kicking are great and all of the information about what is and isn‚Äôt safe from types of exercise to household cleaners and sleeping positions is invaluable. WtEWYE is so cheesy and annoying to listen to whereas this app is real and just gives you the information you need. I‚Äôm so relieved to have found this app!

title: Pretty good overall
body: It‚Äôs really a great app to help keep track of your pregnancy and gives tons of info. I wish it was kept closer to scientific evidence based info, as some is a little out there, but even that isn‚Äôt too bad. I also wish it had more information pertaining to additional pregnancies. Many non-FTMs know the basic ins and outs of pregnancy that the app mostly provides, but not always info on what to expect the second or third time around when your body has been through it before. (IE you‚Äôll start showing sooner)

title: 2 babies now
body: I have had two daughters now and I love this app! It‚Äôs still sending me things about my 4 year old and what to expect! It‚Äôs helped remind me of some of the things I forgot after my oldest daughter Carmen was born and made sure Skylar didn‚Äôt miss out on all the baby activities. Any mom knows when you have multiple the younger ones don‚Äôt get as much attention as the oldest because now your chasing two people! Lol I love love love this app and if I ever have any more we will be using this app!

title: JanaeB1960
body: Literally the best app I could‚Äôve asked for during this pregnancy!! Any question I have it had an answer. All my concerns I look it up on the app it‚Äôs there ! It was completely accurate every week of my pregnancy when it came to her growth and my symptoms. This app kept me on track and has been my go to for baby tips and tricks. Even the tools they provide like the contraction calculator and sleep guide have been amazing for me. Thank you baby center. For a free app this is truly amazing !!

title: I come here for all my questions - love it!
body: I love this app! I have used this app during both pregnancies and there‚Äôs so much information available at your fingertips in one spot, it makes it so quick and convenient to find answers to any questions I have. There is such a wide variety of topics covered and you can read about experiences other moms have had in addition to real facts and research done on a topic and figure out what fits your family best. I highly recommend it.

title: First time
body: First time being pregnant so I have no idea what I am doing or what I should be doing...or not doing and this app has been a life saver!!! Gives u articles to read each week and suggestions. My favorite part is the community! They pair you with groups of women going through a he same thing as you and you can talk to them and feel all the love and support you and your baby need! It don‚Äôt matter if its your first pregnancy or the 5th one this app is for every parent!!!

title: Informative but can be so much better.
body: With all the options to choose from, this app is good but there are a few things I wish were tweaked. I would like to search in the Birth Club for specifics in real time. The boards just seem hard to get to or navigate. Scrolling is the only way to find what you think you‚Äôre looking for. The slideshow bumpie feature keeps crashing the app.

title: My opinion...
body: This app was recommended to me from a friend that had three babies and she personally liked it. This is my first child so I want to experience as much as I can with pregnancy apps. When I logged in the app knew my exact week/day I was pregnant. Then the weeks you are there are different stories, articles, and polls. It also tells and shows you what the size of the baby is. It‚Äôs cute and I really enjoy it. Thank you for making this app. I 100% recommend it!

title: Love it!!!!
body: It‚Äôs my first pregnancy and I wasn‚Äôt sure what to expect. This app has helped me understand what‚Äôs going on inside my body and what to expect looking ahead and even gives tips and ideas of how to prepare! There is a community of parents who speak of their personal experience, and even tools to help you keep track of milestones like baby bumps along with baby names that you like! This app has provided such a fun cool way to keep track of my weekly growth. Thank you for the support!!!!! üíñü•∞ü§óüíï

title: Best Pregnancy and Baby App
body: I got this App as a secondary App to track my pregnancy. I quickly found that although it‚Äôs a free App, it‚Äôs very informative and I‚Äôve learnt so much. I was especially happy to see that I could transition to monitoring and learning about my baby and what to expect as a first time mom! So many of my questions about different aspects of baby health and good habits have been answered here (More technical stuff always consult your Pediatrician). I‚Äôm so grateful for this App and give it all 5 stars happily!

title: Amazing App!
body: I‚Äôve used this app with my first pregnancy and it has been so helpful! It‚Äôs so informative on what to expect and things to do. I had questions for my doctor sometimes and later I noticed on the app it had the answer to my question, I just didn‚Äôt think to look! After that I definitely got on it more! I recommend to all new mom‚Äôs and even if you‚Äôve already had a baby it‚Äôs fun to learn new things you might‚Äôve not known previously. Give it a try!

title: Love the Info & Tracking But....
body: I've unfortunately miscarried and I'm not seeing a way to stop the countdown of "my pregnancy". I'm sure you can understand how annoying this would be, but since this is such an unfortunate but normal occurrence...you would think there would be an easy option or selection to stop the countdown. But nope - it's in my face how far along I would have been :-/

title: Great App and Awesome Community
body: This app is amazing. I downloaded it on a recommendation of someone else while I was pregnant. I loved all the facts it gave me and made me feel closer to my unborn. After I delivered, once you update it to reflect delivery, the information changes to all the developmental milestones of the newborn. The birth club community is awesome! So many questions answered and feeling connected to other mothers that delivered in the same month as me! I love this app and have basically deleted all the other apps I had.

title: Great!
body: Love using this app! I‚Äôve used for over 7 years to track my pregnancies and to relate to moms all over the world who are going through everything that you are. Though 7 years ago it was just a website forum but was always a great resource and never let me down! Which is great especially when you‚Äôre high risk every time it definitely helps knowing there‚Äôs a support system of other moms going through it too that are there for you if needed.

title: Review
body: BabyCenter is a great app! it helped me track my ovulation, then after i conceived it did a wonderful job with weekly updates about how big my baby is getting and how my body is growing. After i gave birth it gave me weekly updates about my baby‚Äôs development; My favorite part about this app is the birth club discussions!! there are so many topics and it‚Äôs great to express any concerns about you, your baby, your body, etc. and it‚Äôs very helpful because everyone has a different opinion.

title: Enjoyed the app!
body: I am a mother of 4 and I used the app with my last 3 children pregnancies. Enjoyed the app. Good information. I was able to use the app with my youngest 2 at the same time. They are 2 years a part. So while I was pregnant, I received pregnancy info and I received info for my son. Did not join birth club so I have no info about it. Just really enjoyed how the app kept me updated during my pregnancies with how many weeks I was and info about me, the baby, and other pregnancy info.

title: Helpful for curious moms ü§ó
body: I‚Äôve used this app with multiple pregnancies now, and like it a lot! The format is very user-friendly, and the articles seem to always be popping up just when a new mom may have questions about that particular topic! It‚Äôs so fun to check in and see how the baby (and momma) should be feeling/looking from week to week. The only annoying part of the app is the incessant cord blood banking ads/articles/polls - especially towards the end of pregnancy.

title: Best pregnancy app
body: This is my first child and this app has guided me all the way from the start, it gives you important information as to what to expect each step of the way from the way your body is changing to what you should and could eat to how big your baby is growing from week to week.  I also love how you can take part of poll questions as to how your experience is going and see how other women are doing as well it feels like you aren't alone.

title: Is good, but needs a preemie section to choose
body: I have been using this app for all four of my pregnancies. My fourth was a bit different than my other three because he was born late preterm. I was hoping that since his birth date was so different than the due date documented on app, it would give me the option to choose a preemie schedule, but it didn‚Äôt. The measuring of the growth tracker is not by any means correct since not only was he preemie, but a big preemie, but the growth tracker is basing my child with full term babies. I‚Äôm about to delete this app since it is not giving me the help I need with this child.

title: Interesting topics but...
body: This application is simple, clear and friendly. I advise the content to encourage women more to go for natural deliveries and to stay active during pregnancy (yoga, aerobics, cardio...) to try hypnobirth, doulas, midwives, chiropractic approach, daily meditation and breathing exercises and to really encourage women to go for a full vegan diet (it completely stops all pregnancy side effects and has a big impact on baby health forever and labor/delivery) plus all the above shortens labor by half and takes out all medications, fears, even hospital delivery. Going back to nature is the best for mommies üòä keep the great work

title: Weeks/days are long but the years, they are short
body: You hear this often and you only feel it once you‚Äôre in the waiting game. Waiting for the exciting development of your baby from the moment you know he or she is forming in you. This app is a great milestone marker along the way. I love(d) getting weekly updates about what I can expect from my fetus-infant-toddler-preschooler. It‚Äôs also great to get a second stream going once i had my #2, there‚Äôs so much we for get.

title: Journey of life
body: I really do like using this app, the week by week, giving you examples of how big your baby is , what symptoms you may be feeling at this part of your gestation ways to communicate to your family and to your partner about how the baby is growing a healthy tips to take care of yourself and the baby during your pregnancy. I also used this app when I lost my first baby and the app also gave me information on how to deal with grieving in a fetal loss and resources

title: Informative and Helpful
body: I have used this app to track both of my pregnancies as well as my children‚Äôs milestones and development for their first year. The app is easy-to-use and helpful. The birthing boards are also helpful and sometimes entertaining. Overall, I would recommend this app to anyone who is expecting. I tried several during my first pregnancy and found that Baby Center had the best layout and most convenient presentation of information.

title: Oh baby üçº üë∂ ‚ÄºÔ∏è
body: Baby Center is by far the best app I currently have on my phone . It has helped me get through. My first trimester without having to worry or question certain symptoms or changes in my body. Keeping track of my pregnancy ü§∞ week by week month by month with the Baby Center App is reassuring and I‚Äôm so glad I downloaded it‚ÄºÔ∏è This app is perfect for first time parents as well as the more experienced ones . I‚Äôm carrying üë∂ baby #2 and boy am I delighted !! Download the BABYCENTER app today ...üöªüöº

title: Look no further than Baby Center
body: Baby Center literally has content on every aspect of motherhood from pregnancy to childbirth, and caring for a baby. If you have a question, any question, especially those really panicky ones that pop into your head at 3am- go straight to Baby Center. There's a high likelihood they have some information that will give you peace of mind or at least give you information so that you can have a more informed discussion with your doctor.

title: Very informative
body: This is my first time being pregnant so this app is keeping me informed on a lot of things I didn‚Äôt know about my baby‚Äôs development and also about how my body is developing too, I also like that it keeps track of how many weeks I am. I only bad part is that I put in my baby info saying that I‚Äôm having a boy but in all my development facts and stuff they keep saying her, I keep double checking to see if I selected boy and I did but they keep saying her or she it‚Äôs really annoying. Only reason I rated the app 4 stars

title: I would give 5 starts if we were able to change our screen name.
body: The app is amazing but unfortunately not 5stars for not giving us the option to be able to change our screen name. A lot of us put last names and got divorced, or a certain date and got a miscarriage, then we are stuck with that name and are forced to delete the account and reopen a new one loosing everything we have such as friends, badges, comments, posts... baby center please do something about it?! Thank you so much! :)

title: The photo stickers need editing
body: I really enjoy this app; however, the stickers intended for the bump pictures need some slight editing. For example, when you combine them to read the size of your baby, you‚Äôll be forced to use the grammatically incorrect sentence ‚ÄúAs big as poppy seed‚Äù or ‚ÄúAs long as kidney bean‚Äù. This might not bother some, but I intended to print these pictures for my pregnancy journal, but can‚Äôt with the grammatical errors. This would be a simple fix of just adding the word ‚Äúa‚Äù or ‚Äúan‚Äù in front of the food items (‚ÄúAs big as a poppy seed‚Äù).

title: My fav of all pregnancy apps!
body: I love that we can post pictures! It makes things so much easier when asking for help and advice and we have pictures for a lore clear cut answer. Like asking about my mucus plug and if what I showed was it as opposed to guessing. I got quick answers. Unlike on Ovia you can‚Äôt post pictures so you are just guessing what people are talking about and have to type out a whole essay describing what you are trying to talk or ask about.

title: Baby center
body: This app is so great !!! I absolutely love it. This app keeps up with the week and day of your baby, and it gives you new and exciting information every week to show you how your baby is growing. I think it's just amazing, all the little questions and wonders about your baby is answered on this app. At the beginning you may think that nothing is happening but the app will tell you every little thing that is going on that will surprise you.

title: Have used with both my babies üôè
body: Baby center is such an easy way to connect with other moms and learn about yourself and your baby as you go through your pregnancy. The birth month groups are so helpful, especially your first time around when everything is so new and you have questions and curiosities about everything, it‚Äôs nice to share experiences with others. The app is easy to use and fun to show your kiddo‚Äôs and spouse your babies‚Äô progress.

title: Wish this was around for my first 3 kids!
body: I love this app! So my kids range from (brace yourself) 21 years old to a new baby 3 months old! Hubby and I were high school sweethearts and apparently still so in love LoL!  :) I have a 2 year old and she‚Äôs my only girl and this was my discovery of this amazing app. So much valuable information and my favorite is tracking the stages and sizes. My 21, 19 and 14 year old sons are awesome but boy this app would have been so great for a young mama. Thanks so much for the wonderful content.

title: Such a good app
body: I‚Äôve been using this app since I found out I was pregnant back in 2019. I‚Äôve used it almost everyday during and after my pregnancy. It does a great job at explaining the process one goes through and the baby goes through (keep in mind that everyone is different) It‚Äôll suggest things for mom and baby and also partner! I appreciate the app- it‚Äôs never glitched or anything like that. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôll delete it. It‚Äôs been a good year and 3 months for me!

title: The best
body: I love the baby center app! It‚Äôs all around and was very instrumental to my mental health when I was suffering from infertility. There were so many moms and group and forums to utilize and I found myself on the app all the time looking for information. When I got pregnant I enjoyed the weekly updates on how far along I was and now that my baby is here I get updates on his progress or what to look for throughout his growth. I love this app and I rarely leave reviews but this one was very deserving!

title: Great app, hate the new layout
body: This app always stood out from the rest of the apps and was easy to navigate. When I opened the app and saw the new layout, I was confused thinking I clicked the wrong app because it looks like every other baby app. Really bummed out because even though it‚Äôs a sleek modern look, it‚Äôs not easy to navigate, the dates are off, it no longer goes day by day and you have to fish around digging for what used to be there on the home screen. Hopefully they give an option to switch between old/new version for those who prefer the old version.

title: Love this app!!!
body: I used it when I had my first child 8 years ago. Recommend it to my cousin when she had her baby 2 years ago and now that I‚Äôm pregnant, I started using it again. Love the fact that it shows me week by week the size of my baby and what is developing during that week. Not only during your pregnancy but also after the baby is born. Makes me feel more like I know what‚Äôs going in with my baby‚Äôs development before and after.

title: Best app- like a unique pregnancy friend!
body: I love this app... it‚Äôs so nicely organized and intuitive. The articles are approachable and completely relevant, pretty much to the day! It‚Äôs like it could sense when I had a new symptom I was unsure of and before I would bring myself to the scary world of googling my symptoms it would notify me that I may be experiencing symptom a, b, and c at this point and that it was normal. Highly recommend this to anyone and I honestly wouldn‚Äôt have had as good a pregnancy experience without it!

title: First time !!!!!!!
body: It's exiting to have this app as a first time parent it's amazing to see your baby's progress. As a father we don't get to experience all the changes that happen with everyday or every week. Which makes us unaware of of baby's and mother needs. With this app I get to read and see information about the changes that happen and helps me to look out for my wife needs. So thank you for BabyCenter you are not just an app but also part of the team.

title: Great app, needs more info for twins
body: The only reason I‚Äôm giving it four stars instead of five is that I am having twins and the app is 98% geared towards a singleton baby. Having twins is quite a different experience and it would have been great to have more information and articles available. That being said, I did really enjoy the app and the information provided. I liked that there was something new ever day, the size of your baby (again different with two!), and the additional features. Overall a great app.

title: Wonderful and Informative App!
body: This app is awesome for me as a new first time mother. They send me a ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre now .. Weeks Pregnant! See how your baby looks this week‚Äù every time I turn a new week pregnant and it makes me so happy and excited! Love getting notifications like that in the morning. Very informative on information and I use it a lot to ask very common questions that others have answered years ago! Would 10/10 recommend this app to any pregnant mommy to be! *and I do!

title: Beat app ever
body: This app has been with me since the day I found out I was pregnant, it helped me prepare as I waited to be a mom, it showed me pictures and videos of what my baby looked like every week! Till the day she was born, and then it taught me tricks for soothing my fussy baby, and helped me get through the hard times with the other mothers input. Honestly if it wasn‚Äôt for this app I would have been totally lost... my baby is now going to be 1 and I want to thank everyone who made this app!!!

title: Super helpful, encourages you to be open minded
body: During my first pregnancy I initially only used this app to track the size of my baby. As time went on the app proved to have shared interesting and insightful information about different types of pregnancies. It seems unbiased, and encourages you to keep an open mind about your options and decisions you‚Äôll have to make as new parents. I especially liked the free videos that take you through Labor, it was like a free Lamaze class!

title: Great bc free
body: It's one of the few free apps that lets you keep track of your pregnancy with great tips and weekly updates on what to expect in changes to your body and also what new developments your baby is going through that week. Great visuals and comparisons with useful informational videos. Also has a great forum for moms and expecting moms that have questions for people who are going through the same thing or have been through the same thing for a good Peace of mind. ....AND ITS FREE THE BEST PART.

title: All pregnant mothers need this app!
body: Whether its your first child or whether it's your last this app keeps a pregnant mom going. I check it everyday to have updates on my baby and my pregnancy. With this app I feel like my symptoms are normal and I feel like this pregnancy is actually one of the best things in life I can experience because it brings me closer to my baby and boyfriend. He downloaded it too to keep track of our little ones.  My Pregnancy Today is a must have!

title: Such a GREAT resource
body: Honestly, I am so so thankful for this free app. I used it throughout my first pregnancy and now I‚Äôll be using it during my second. It has answered so many of my random- and not so random- questions and has really given me peace of mind about symptoms I experience and about my babies. I have t used it much since having my baby but I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs just as useful for raising kiddos too! Maybe I will try that out more now that I‚Äôll be using it during pregnancy #2. :)

title: LOVE IT
body: I love everything about this app. It not only gives you updated information about your baby‚Äôs development during your pregnancy but it also gives you updates about your own body and what you may be experiencing week to week - month to month. Oh and I love that you continue to track you baby after birth thats awesome! I love knowing what they should be doing next and how to help them reach their milestones. The pictures are fabulous!

title: Great app!!
body: I have been using this app since finding out I was pregnant at 7 weeks gestation. It has allowed me to track growth, learn information relevant to me and my baby, and let our other children and my spouse feel included! Now that our little boy is here we are able to get even more information about his growth. I would highly recommend every new mother use this app!! I‚Äôm mother of 5 and still found it to be very helpful and reassuring!! Thank you!!

title: Love the app but it's days are confusing
body: So far the app has been great. I've had to modify my due date because I'll go through the week like normal, then I'll get to day 7, which on my other apps takes me to the next week (ex: 7 weeks 7 days on the BabyCenter app is 8 weeks on all my other pregnancy apps). It's confusing to me and it's frankly annoyed me a little because I want to get the exact day's information. If I leave it be then it leaves me a day behind or a day ahead and I don't know why. Other than that I like it.

title: Unable to log in.
body: I‚Äôm giving a 3 star rate because every time i want ir need to read something about the development of my baby it doesn‚Äôt allow me to log in automatically. They send me emails and when I click on them to read more about the subject I‚Äôm interested on it redirects me to the application but asks me to log in and I do and it doesn‚Äôt logs me in. So it really annoys me because as a mother of a baby I have no time to log in all the time. I don‚Äôt know if this issue can be fixed, I don‚Äôt know if to others have happened before. Othe than that the app is very helpful.

title: Amazing app
body: Having the feature of being able to track exactly how far along I was to the day was amazing. Even when my due date changed it was easy to change it in the app so it was up to date. Also the pictures showing what size your baby is compared to fruit and vegetables is a really nice feature, I always went to the store to buy what the food of the week was to see how heavy and long my baby was.

title: My go to app
body: I‚Äôm on baby #3 and baby center app has never let me down. Always provides insight on what to expect in the weeks and months ahead giving you the heads up on what stage your baby is going through throughout the pregnancy. I also love the fact that they go beyond to recommend healthy food options, include the birth clubs, and provides all kind of overall tips for mom during pregnancy and even after birth. This app is a game changer! Love it!!!

title: Best pregnancy & baby app!! Highly recommend it!
body: Its the greatest app I found so far and very informative. It caters to all kinds of parenting and mentions many topics which parents might go through. Their advice is very useful and the information is up to date. I was never disappointed from day 20 (when I downloaded it) of my pregnancy till my baby‚Äôs birth and still using to learn about my kids growth.

title: Tracker doesn‚Äôt update
body: I am pleased with all of the features of the app except the actual tracking. I will get notifications that I‚Äôm XX weeks and days along but when I go into the app it doesn‚Äôt show that. Sometimes it will take a few days but currently it says I‚Äôm 11weeks5days when I‚Äôm actually 13weeks today.... you can change the home page to be on whatever week you want which somewhat fixes this but it still says I‚Äôm looking 2weeks ahead. Maybe I just got a lemon because other people on my birth board doesn‚Äôt seem to have this issue...

title: Ya‚Äôll got lucky!
body: Look, I normally don‚Äôt do reviews ‚Äî at all. This is my first review ever. Maybe it‚Äôs the hormones (duh) but this app is very informative and as a young woman who couldn‚Äôt get to my doctor until around 12 weeks ‚Äòcause tricare took forever to obtain; this app was all I had. I will forever thank God for this app.

title: The best
body: This app has helped me a looooot. I tracked my baby through every single milestone before delivery and now after delivery, I joined birth club. There are hundreds of helpful people who respond with in hours and many times gave wonderful suggestions to raise my little one. I‚Äôm extremely happy with the app and am recommending it to every single Friend of mine who are pregnant. It feels happy to know that you are not alone and also someone else is there for you. Highly recommended!

title: Long time fan
body: Giving this app 5 stars for so many reasons. The first reason is for all the rich information it has. Second reason is I love how it follows u from pregnancy to baby. And lastly I love how I can refer back to the app if I have any questions I can just get some of my answers through this app.

title: Group owners BULLY members
body: I was only on this app for an hr before I began getting bullied by 2 forumn owners in the ‚Äútrying to conceive‚Äù group. Zicc and IVFwarrior attacked me and would not stop commenting on my post being extremely rude over me asking a simple question. Luckily many of the group members came in my defense and expressed concern over how I was being treated and answered my question politely. It sounds far fetched but if I had receipts to show I would. Unfortunately right when everyone came to my rescue they deleted the post. I could not believe people in a pregnancy app of all places would treat people like that. Deleting this app and finding a different one. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THE TRYING TO CONCEIVE GROUP!! If you do, watch out for ZICC AND IVFWARRIOR. ONLINE BULLIES!

title: My favorite baby app
body: I tried a handful of pregnancy/baby apps and this is my favorite. I like all the tools/ baby names, bumpies, is it safe etc, and the article suggestions every week are great. The community is generally supportive and mature, unlike some of the other apps that seemed to be filled with exclusively19 year old trolls. The only thing it‚Äôs missing from other apps is a daily display at the top that gives you estimated weight/length, and countdown for how many days are left. I like that I can keep using it once he‚Äôs born too.

title: Trust me greatest pregnancy app.
body: It has everything. Love the pictures the options, the stage by stage information on the pregnancy and all the information about literally everything you should know to help you with your pregnancy, and what‚Äôs even better this app connects you to a community of women who are due to give birth in the same month as you so that along your pregnancy you have other women who you can communicate with about what you‚Äôre going through.

title: It has so many information
body: I‚Äôm a second time mother, my big boy have 4 years and my newborn girl of three weeks. I have done this before and let me tell you, they‚Äôre so different. My boy was so sleepy and he sleep through the night so fast. My newborn not so much she stays awake after feeding and she don‚Äôt sleep through the night and this app help me get her to sleep, help me get track of feedings and diaper changes. Even help me on burping, my baby will thank you, I‚Äôm getting better!

title: Love this app, highly recommended
body: I‚Äôve been using his app from the beginning of my first pregnancy and while my baby is growing and developing. The weekly updates have been my favorite way to learn what‚Äôs going on in my belly while he was an embryo and fetus and still I love the weekly updates and what to expect coming up. When I have questions baby center always has an article or videos about everything! I love this app and the knowledge I have gained as a new mom.

title: Better than all the books!
body: After having my fourth child, twelve years after my last, I can easily say that Baby Center and your doctor can give you all the information you need to have an informed pregnancy. Even though I had been through pregnancy and babies three times before, I‚Äôve really enjoyed having Baby Center as a resource. It helps you know what to expect and what to do without instilling fear. Thank you Baby Center!

title: App
body: I absolutely Love this app it has got me through so many questions that I have that I want to text somebody else and now I don‚Äôt have to ask anybody because of this app gives you so much great information saved you a lot of time on looking stuff up. Plus it gives you updates every time you reach a new week which I think it‚Äôs just great because it‚Äôs great to know what‚Äôs going on with my baby and my body as a first-time parent

title: My savior and I still use it
body: The fact that I don‚Äôt have to pay for this app is just a blessing and from the start of my pregnancy till this very day I still love and use this app!!!! I have recommended it to all my friends and family. I just hope this app helps everyone as much as it always helps me!!!!! Baby 2 on the way and this was my first app to turn to again üíïüòªü•∞ü§© it helped me so much as a first time to understand my whole pregnancy journey

title: Love this app
body: Going on 3 years of using it since my first pregnancy and I love it. Keeps track of my toddler as well as my baby on the way. Only glitch is that sometimes when opening it from an email or my notifications on iOS phone, it doesn‚Äôt take you directly to your app already logged in. It‚Äôll seem as if your logged out but you have to close the app and go to the link again. It‚Äôs the only kink I‚Äôve found so far.

title: Love everything about this App!
body: As a first time mom I have/had a lot of questions. I have definitely appreciated the weekly reminder each time I enter a new week and what each week of development brings. The supplemental information regarding pregnancy symptoms and what you can expect as normal or an emergency have also helped keep me calm and manage expectations :) Now I‚Äôm entering the season where I need to count kicks and the kick counter is so cute and helpful! Love this app!

title: The most informative and accurate App.
body: This is by far the most informative and accurate app for keeping up with your baby‚Äôs progress and pregnancy. We are expecting baby#2 and we love how it keeps up with your child‚Äôs growth development, what to expect and  open chat groups for different parents. We used this app for both of our children. And I love how it shows you the image and detail of what your baby looks like each week.

title: My guidance after the doctor
body: I am using this app since my early pregnancy. I am amazed by the fact that it is so accurate about what I will be encountering with my 7 month old little one every week. Apart from that, all the useful info come in full coordination with my doctor's advice. Plus once I had some questions regarding the articles, I had an e-mailed answer right to me, on the next 24 hours explaining everything. These things build up trust.

title: Great App for expecting & new moms
body: Helps track fetal development and growth after baby arrives. I like that emails are sent with weekly progress updates. Be sure to sign up for the emails as there is info there that is not on the app. That would be my suggestion for improvement, have a link to the emailed info on the app so curious moms like me (that read at 3am during feedings) can access all info available in one place. Otherwise the app is great! Love and recommend it!

title: Love this app!! THANK YOU BabyCenter!!
body: I am a first time mom going through my first pregnancy and I am so thankful that I have this app to guide me!! I love the daily/weekly countdown and helpful articles. I love that I can search for articles and even for discussion posts from other moms about questions or issues I may come across as I progress in my pregnancy. I love the bumpie feature which reminds me to take a weekly picture of my belly. Overall the app is fun and gives me a lot of peace of mind.

title: Great informational app
body: Thank you so much for this wonderful app. It has helped me and still guides me every week on what to expect. This is my first pregnancy and your app has full of information and it is just amazing.

title: Review
body: It been fun to track my growing babe week to week the only thing that bottlers me I‚Äôm having a boy and every article talks as if I‚Äôm having a girl. Just don‚Äôt see the point of customizing gender along with the birthdate of it doesn‚Äôt reflect in your weekly info. Also found some other apps give you a little more info week to week. While sometimes this one seems to not give you many changes week to week. Other then that it‚Äôs been user friendly and informative in the articles and q&a

title: Love it
body: I found this app very helpful through the pregnancy and especially while breastfeeding. Reading a lot of useful information at one place is very convenient. This app doesn‚Äôt have contradictions, it makes you more calm and even cool that I can do this. Every time I finished the article, I felt courage to parent by baby. I trust you, guys. Hope to see more interesting information.

title: My favorite baby app
body: I used a different app at the beginning of my pregnancy but the tracker was incorrect so I switched to Babycenter and I‚Äôm glad I did! I love all of the articles they have for each week. It helped me to know what to expect for my first pregnancy and into the first few months of having a new baby. I look forward to their weekly updates of what to look for in my baby and ideas for fun games to play with her that encourage that development.

title: LOVE IT!!
body: This is honestly the best app ever to keep me updated on my baby. It really gets down to details and graphics. I get notifications that are very helpful and I really enjoy knowing exactly when I am a certain number of weeks pregnant. If it wasn‚Äôt for this app, I would be so lost lol That was when I was pregnant and now that I‚Äôve had my baby I still get a lot of details and notifications that are so helpful and fun! I love this app and recommend it to ALL parents. THANK YOI BABY CENTER!! ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Grandma
body: My daughter is pregnant for the first time with a baby girl.  I signed up for this app to follow along with all the changes she will be going through and to learn things I didn‚Äôt know when I was pregnant with her 37 years ago.  I am enjoying her journey with this excellent informative and very interesting app.  I get emails every week with an update on how the baby is developing.  Of course, the app is focused on mom with all sorts of health, baby, and preparations needed when baby comes.   I love it!

title: Love this app.
body: I‚Äôve been using this app since i found out I was pregnant at 5 weeks (6 weeks postpartum now) and I love it. I always looked forward to seeing how big my baby was and how he was developing. My only complaint is that sometimes people can be pretty mean on the app, but that‚Äôs anywhere. Overall, babycenter makes you feel a little less alone in your journey of motherhood! Definitely recommend if you‚Äôre trying to conceive/are pregnant.

title: Love keeping track of my baby!
body: I started using this app late in my pregnancy and really liked it. My baby is 5 months old now and I still open this app up every single day. I love how it gives info pertaining to the progression and development of my baby. All the tips are appreciated and there are so many tools to utilize within as well. Surprisingly, the chat groups have been super helpful also. It's nice to get support from other first time moms like myself.

title: Use it for years!
body: I have a 4 year old and an 8 month old. Baby Center is my go-to for any questions I have, growth development insights, and learning more about what to expect with my growing family. I have loved the growth charts, with my infant son who was almost labeled failure to thrive, and then also keeping up with my daughter‚Äôs stats because having a newborn makes it hard to remember these things. I love this app and can‚Äôt say enough on how it saves my sanity as a mother!

title: This app is everything
body: This app was everything for me when I was pregnant even till my baby turned one. I will highly recommend it those who re getting pregnant or pregnant already or they have delivered baby you will get all your confusion clear answer of any questions everything related. Trust me. Not even nutrition, food, toy, I mean everything even it helps me to choose my baby name. Love love love this appp. If it has any option I would give10 star.

title: Amazing for First Time Pregnancies
body: The app tracks the baby and the changes in your body, so it was very comforting as a first time pregnant woman. I also like how diverse all the articles are - there‚Äôs information and research on just about anything you want to know on there. I also enjoyed being part of a forum with other moms due around the same time as me. I could ask them questions and feel comforted that I wasn‚Äôt alone in any of my worries or anticipations.

title: Overall I enjoyed the app!
body: I loved keeping track of my growth and the babies during my pregnancy. It is also nice to contact with other mothers who are going through similar things you are. The only thing I genuinely disliked was some of the very rude members within some of the birth groups or different groups. Of course, these groups allow free and open conversation but they can really be such a negative experience for some users. Some people are just not nice but other than that the app works very well.

title: Love it!! Community after birth is the best!
body: As a new mom during this pandemic I love having a support group to ask questions to. The pregnancy tracker was good, I didn‚Äôt look much though except for what fruit my baby was the size of. The group chat for moms/dads according to the birth month is awesome. Everyone else is at the same point I‚Äôm at so it‚Äôs been very helpful asking questions. I don‚Äôt feel like I‚Äôm doing this all alone. I have no tech issues with the app itself.

title: Review by Christina D
body: This app is great! The information listed as each week goes by is very helpful. I share it with my boyfriend as the weeks go by and it‚Äôs cool to be able to share that information with him because other wise he would have no clue lol üòÇ especially the symptom part. Thank you for making such a useful and user friendly app to help us expecting mothers during this exciting time in our lives!! A+++ rating from this Momma!

title: Amazing app - everything you will need to know
body: If is your first baby or even the second it doesn‚Äôt matter this app will teach you / remind you what‚Äôs going on with your baby on each step. Works perfectly with any life style, you can read it while you are feeding your baby or before going to bed. It‚Äôs super interesting I love it !! I used for my first baby and now for the second one to remind me things that maybe I didn‚Äôt read

title: Jessalex
body: This app is great! It‚Äôs full of good info, links and tips. I love that it also connects you to other moms with similar due dates. Overall I have enjoyed it! The only thing I would change is that I didn‚Äôt always feel the vegetables or fruits they used to represent baby‚Äôs size were accurate or a good example of baby‚Äôs development but that‚Äôs just my opinion. This has been a great app to have throughout my first pregnancy and a great resource as well!

title: Best prenatal app
body: I absolutely love this app! From the beginning when I hid my pregnancy to now sharing all the little growths and facts with my daughter, it has helped me grow through it all. From answering weird questions and concerns, to fun growing baby and mom facts, I would definitely recommend. The community forum is awesome as well. You get to connect with other moms, hear what their questions or concerns may be, and make new friends. Definitely would recommend the app!

title: Great!!
body: I‚Äôve  Used this app since around week 5 of pregnancy and still  continue to even tho my baby is 2 months old‚Äî- I still love reading about his development and the fun little surprises I learn about him! Great app with lots of extras but If you like cute pictures, maybe not for you.... if you just want good information with more realistic pics of baby it‚Äôs perfect. And you still get to see how your baby is the ‚Äúsize of an avocado‚Äù or whatever!!

title: Helpful resource
body: Each week I‚Äôm looking forward to the information provided by the app. It‚Äôs simple and not too wordy. There is also a community resource of other moms in the same due date period, which I would go into comment or learn every now and then.

title: Love this app
body: I have loved this app since I became pregnant with my son! I loved watching each week to see how big he was, also to see him developing. Once I had him I kept with the app for his first year to watch what his next move might be. It made me feel more connected as a new mom. He is almost a year old. It‚Äôs bittersweet to know my son has graduated from the baby app. But when we have our next child, I will definitely be using this app again!

title: Negativity
body: I love everything about this app, except the bullies. I‚Äôve seen it so many times.. a mom asks a simple question and gets negative sarcastic comments. Why can‚Äôt they just ignore it? I was seriously bullied for my post  about being Christian and was told I have white privilege by ‚Äúcommunity owners‚Äù when in fact I never said my race. After that post a community owner bullied me on a totally different posts and other posters would comment pictures making fun of Jesus. That is not okay. I hate going on the app now because I just want to ask questions but I will be bullied just because of my ‚Äú white privilege & religion ‚Äú it makes me sad..

title: Great app!
body: Honestly, this a great app and I love what they did when they updated it. But now that it‚Äôs been updated, nothing loads. It‚Äôs always a blank screen. It‚Äôs annoying because every time I want to look at what the new week is like, whether it‚Äôs my body or the baby, it never loads and it‚Äôs just a white screen. And some articles will load which is nice but if it doesn‚Äôt, I just try to remember what the title was and look it up on the internet instead. Maybe it‚Äôs a bug but it‚Äôs still an okay app. I‚Äôd just wait for a new update before downloading this app.

title: Good experience for the while, then it fell apart
body: I looked forward to checking the app each week, as I watched my baby grow. There is useful information and the articles are quite good. However, it wasn‚Äôt the only app I was using. I found others more engaging, as they added something new each day, versus just on a weekly basis. Then, after 5 months of use, I needed to log back in to the Baby Centre app each time I wanted to use the app. That ultimately ruined the experience. This happened first every 3 days, and then every day. So, I just deleted the app.

title: Every new parent‚Äôs peace of mind
body: Can‚Äôt tell you how many times I have come to your app and been put at ease by simply gaining more knowledge. Being a new parent is hard in so many ways. BabyCenter is just so easy to navigate and has so much information on so many different topics. Not to mention the weekly notifications from pregnancy to your growing baby, how they grow, what to expect, things to consider, it‚Äôs just beautiful. Oh and truly free!! Thanks BabyCenter!

title: Awesome for new moms
body: I love this app!  I am 20 years old and this is my first pregnancy. It has been an emotional rollercoaster but Babycenter has helped me through it. I get to monitor my little babies growth week by week. It also gives information on what to expect with my symptoms. I love being able to have an album of my baby bump. I also love that I can chat with other ladies expecting the same time as I am. I highly recommended this, especially for new moms.

title: Ahh
body: I would give this star a 5 star but u just can‚Äôt bring myself too it. People can be very very rude and judgmental on this app !!! I have literally deleted this app 2 times because this app does more mental damage from all the mean,hateful and careless people that are on it. They give good tips and good baby updates but just wish they would do something to make it more of a happy and positive app other then a judge mental , arguing 24/7 over some stupid stuff app like literally if you post more then one thing about one topic you will get jumped on by so many woman and it‚Äôs not even fun like literally it causes more stress then anything..... I would love this app if it wasn‚Äôt for all the bullying and judging!!!

title: So far the best
body: Everything is so much easier and helpful. From just specifying what part of your last period to punch in to navigating the do‚Äôs and donts, suggestions of fun things to do (I.e starting weekly tummy pictures even in first trimester). So much information and such ease of getting it all. Loving this app much more than any of the others I‚Äôve downloaded so far.

title: Thanks for the Info
body: I was so so happy to find out I would be a mom and was fully prepared to do all that was expected of me. Now after downloading your app, I truly see how hard parenting can be so I decided not to carry it to full term. I loved that child and would have be so glad to raise it if it didn't require so much work but don't get the wrong idea. I couldn't just throw this small child in the trash along with the coat hanger so I decided to bury it in a shoebox in the backyard.

title: Good app
body: Good app. It updates you every week on how your baby is growing while your pregnant and once your baby is born. They have different topics each day of the week. These topics are helpful and informative. The only thing I found as a tiny negative was if I had a specific question trying to find the answer wasn‚Äôt as easy as I would have liked. But I just googled my question and just clicked on the link for the answer that was on this app. Would definitely recommend this to any new Mom to be.

title: Great App! Highly recommend
body: Great app!!!! Especially for first time moms. Baby center has a lot of valuable information, tips and videos to help you on your journey. It was exciting to get updates on my baby‚Äôs growth which were pretty accurate. I also loved when it switched over after my baby was born. I was not expecting it to continue after she was born. The continued information and advice has helped a lot. I highly recommend this app

title: The only pregnancy app I still use
body: I started my pregnancy by downloading 3 pregnancy apps (What to Expect, Bump, and BabyCenter). Now at 13 weeks, BabyCenter is the only one I still use daily. Every day updates with new baby growth updates, articles, and tips. My favorite feature is the Birth Club, a forum of other moms-to-be with the same due date as you. Great for connecting, sharing, and asking questions with women who are going through the same thing as you.

title: I love this app
body: It tells me everything Im curious about and always has interesting facts. I also love all the polls and I especially love seeing the baby‚Äôs progress every week! My favorite thing about the app is all the details about the baby‚Äôs progress, I cry every single time üòù‚ò∫Ô∏è This app is great because its everything you would find in a parenting book, but free, paperless, and unbiased!

title: From a Dad
body: My wife and I downloaded this app to track the status of our pregnancy. As a dad I was able to see and understand everything that my wife was seeing and I was able to celebrate her accomplishments throughout the entire pregnancy. Because of this app I became more aware and knowledgeable about the stages of my wife‚Äôs pregnancy and the development of our child. Overall this app is exceptional. Now our son in 12 mo. and we are still engaged

title: Just avoid the birth club discussions
body: Unless you‚Äôre into social media drama.

title: Favorite Baby app
body: I love this app! I downloaded it as I found out I was expecting (@ 7 weeks) & learned many new things EVERY WEEK about the growth of my baby. It was exciting to know what was happening inside of me. Almost a year later, I still use this app to inform myself  about the stages of my baby who is 11 months & what to expect on X week . I am able to prep myself beforehand and gather the necessary items to help my baby out during his first year .

title: Great App For Trying to Have, Having, and Had a Baby
body: Got this app when I was pregnant. It helps you look forward to milestones during your pregnancy and shows you what your baby should look like during each week. It helps during pregnancy to have this every week to look forward to!

title: A must-have!
body: My husband made an account when I was pregnant, and I thought it was the sweetest thing. I made one shortly after and never looked back. 17 months later and the information is just as useful as before. Week after week, I learn something new about my child. There is also a feature that allows you to store measurements and track your baby‚Äôs growth. Simply put, Baby Center is a must-have for every stage!

title: Love
body: Use this app all the time. Love it. Only thing I wish there was a search button inside the app because I usually end up using google for questions and I can find an answer from baby center and it will open it up in the app. So I wish I could just search from within the app. That's my l only issue I could think of but not that big of a deal. Used this during my pregnancy and still do my baby is 6 months now

title: Love it!
body: Pregnancy can be so boring towards the end! I can‚Äôt wait to meet my daughter but also get depressed, anxious, worried, scared, everything possible.. this app keeps my mind occupied for hours no matter what mood or emotion I‚Äôm in that day üòã love it. The videos are great, articles are informative, and the support you get from other members seriously keeps me alive! No matter what your thinking there‚Äôs a thread to read or join so you can feel better or get answers!

title: Best baby/pregnancy app
body: I‚Äôve used this app/website for two pregnancies and children so far and it has helped me be a better mom.  It warns me when my baby is about to change so I‚Äôm not thrown off by it.  It gives great advice at just the right time.  I call the baby center emails my weekly ‚Äúmommy homework.‚Äù  When my husband asks me why our son is doing something weird I forward him the baby center email and he understands.  Get it.  You need it, parents.

title: No option for twins/multiples
body: Normally I would love this app, but beings there is no option for multiples of any kind I can not truly keep track of my babies development the same way as every other moms. Plus it only lists concerns that an average pregnancy would have to worry about and not the possible effects that having more than one could cause not only to the mother but to the other babies involved in said pregnancy. Granted having multiples isn‚Äôt as common but it would still be nice to be thought of especially for new moms as a starting ground who have no idea of what kind of questions to ask their doctors

title: Great App
body: This is my first time using it and i have no complaints. Once you play around with the app like most apps you get the hang of it and it becomes easier. It has alot of helpful information and tips that come in handy for me and my spouse. He loves it because he gets to feel closer to me and the baby.
